thread.title: 50 ways to celebrate National Taco Day
thread.title_full: 50 ways to celebrate National Taco Day

title: 50 ways to celebrate National Taco Day
locations: N.M. La Posta de Mesilla Nashville
text: Videos 50 ways to celebrate National Taco Day At New York City's Bodega Negra, chef Michael Armstrong serves up nine kinds of tacos in twos, including peking duck, pork belly, lobster and veggie, to name a few. Melissa Hom In LA, Guisados offers a celebrated mini-flight of tacos. Guisados At Los Chingones in Denver, chef Troy Guard’s tacos feature exotic meats such as kangaroo, snake and camel. Los Chingones In New York City, Butter serves miniature Brussels sprouts tacos in its secret garden. Rafael Marxuach With six locations throughout Greater Boston, Anna’s Taqueria has been the city’s most beloved taco destination since opening in 1995. Anna’s Taqueria At Gilbert’s Underground Kitchen in Jacksonville, Fla., chef Kenny Gilbert creates Fried Cactus Tacos with avocado jalapeño crema, salsa fresca, cabbage and cilantro. Gilbert’s Underground Kitchen In Scottsdale, Ariz., chef Chris Schlattman serves Slow Roasted Pork Pibil Tacos at The Upton. Scottsdale Convention & Visitors Bureau Enjoy Pibil Cochinita tacos from Taco Bamba in Falls Church, Va. Taco Bamba Taqueria Grab an Al Pastor taco from Papi's Tacos in Greenville, S.C. Papi's Tacos Find real Tex-Mex more than 1,000 miles from the border at Iowa City's Pancheros. Try the steak tacos year-round. Narayan Mahon There are few meals more festive than those at Portland, Ore.'s funky Por Que No. Try fish, chicken and pork tacos paired with a Modelo Especial. David Lantham Reamer Chicago's Big Star tacos offers eight varieties of pork, chicken and vegetable tacos. Edouard Pierre Try a Chile Relleno Taco at Loteria Grill in LA. Loteria Grill Try Tacos de Lechon at Toloache in New York City. Atsushi Tomioka Chow down with a Carnitas Taco Trio at Cantina Rooftop in New York City. Cantina Rooftop New York City's Refinery Rooftop will serve the Not Your Average Fish Taco with seared salmon, red peppers, pineapple, mango, cilantro, butternut squash, savoy cabbage and chipotle sour cream on National Taco Day. Picasa Elevate your Mexican meal with Chayo's take on lobster tacos in Las Vegas. Chayo Loteria Grill also offers chicken tacos. Alex Blazedale, www.lataco.com At Merchant’s Restaurant in Nashville, chef Duane Loftus serves Fish Tacos with mojo, pico de gallo, jalapeno aioli, guacamole and slaw. Merchant’s Restaurant At Fuego Cocina y Tequileria in Arlington, Va., chef Jeff Tunks serves goat, pork and beef tongue tacos with corn tortillas and a variety of salsas. Scott Suchman Treat yourself to glazed short rib tacos in an elevated setting at ABC Cocina in New York City. Amy Beata Enjoy extreme street tacos from Tacos & Tequila at Luxor Las Vegas. Tacos & Tequila Mercadito -- in Chicago, New York and Las Vegas -- offers Tacos Camaron with slices of avocado. Drew Templeton Choose from pork, chicken or vegetable tacos which can be ordered a la carte. Oyamel Cocina Mexicana Enchiladas from Guero's Taco Bar in Austin was named in Foursquare's "Tastes That Make the City" series for Tex-Mex. Foursquare The Breakfast Taco with Doña Sauce from Austin's Tacodeli was named in Foursquare's "Tastes That Make the City" series for tacos. Foursquare Few tacos have taken a city by storm like Kogi BBQ's in LA, and with a trio you can try three of the four kinds (choose from pork, chicken, tofu and short rib). Eric Shin LA's Mexicali Taco is a champion of carne asada. Matthew Lee The Short Rib Pastrami Taco with Mustard Seed Salsa from New York's Empellón Taqueria was named in Foursquare's "Tastes That Make the City" for tacos. Foursquare At Black Tap Craft Burgers & Beer in New York, chef/co-partner Joe Isidori is offering Black Tap Chorizo Tacos with Queso Fresco, fresh lime, pico de gallo, pickled red onion and cilantro on flour tortillas for National Taco Day. Black Tap Craft Burgers & Beer At New York City's Salvation Taco, try classic carnitas tacos with pork, salsa and cilantro. Salvation taco Brave tacos de cabeza (head) at Tacos Al Vapor El Canelo in LA. Alex Blazedale, www.lataco.com A steak soft taco is topped with avocado, sour cream and hot sauce at Dos Toros Taqueria in New York City. Dos Toros Taqueria At Winston Restaurant in Mt. Kisco, N.Y., chef Michael Williams offers fish tacos made with tequila-lime marinated halibut fish, mole, lime cilantro cabbage slaw and pico de gallo in soft flour tortillas. Winston Restaurant Marination ma kai serves Aloha sliders and spicy pork tacos in Seattle. Karen Ussery At Atlanta's Taqueria del Sol, go for the fried chicken taco with lime jalapeño mayonnaise. Taqueria del Sol Jose Andres celebrates Mexican fare at Oyamel Cocina Mexicana in Washington, D.C. Oyamel Cocina Mexicana Try classic chicken tacos with chips, salsa and beer at La Posta de Mesilla in Mesilla, N.M. La Posta de Mesilla Nashville's native all-night coffeehouse Bongo Java serves up a root veggie taco. Bongo Java Rubio’s is where San Diego's fish taco revolution began and still thrives. Rubio's Baja Grill Mariscos Jalisco serves some of the tastiest Mexican food in LA. Alex Blazedale, www.lataco.com Rubi's al pastor tacos are often ranked among Chicago's best. Evelyn Ramirez Try bright short rib tacos at HuaHua's Taqueria in Miami. Jipsy We love the puffy tacos at Swift's Attic in Austin, Texas. USA TODAY At Abe Fisher, Philly phenom Michael Solomonov’s culinary song to the Jewish diaspora, the veal schnitzel taco is a multicultural mash-up and bona fide crowd pleaser. Abe Fisher At Alma de Cuba near Philly's Rittenhouse Square, the smoked albacore tacos are topped with iceberg lettuce, jalapenos and malanga. STARR Restaurants Buena Onda, a beach-inspired casual spot from Jose Garces in Philadelphia, specializes in fish tacos. Jason Varney At Cedar Pass Restaurant within Badlands National Park (in Interior, S.D.), order the Sioux Indian Tacos. Fluffy fry bread, a Native American staple, is smothered with refried beans, buffalo meat, shredded lettuce, tomatoes, cheddar cheese and black olives. Wendy Pramik Try mahi mahi tacos crafted with cheddar, cilantro cream and mango salsa at Crabby Bill's in Clearwater, Fla. Cox Digital Imaging Try the Vampiros Steak Taco at Four Seasons Palm Beach. Four Seasons Like this topic? You may also like these photo galleries: Replay
